SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER ()ROWNUM , NOTICE_ID , NOTICE_TTL , REG_EMP_ID , REG_DT , COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_ITEMS FROM NOTICE n WHERE 1=1
AND NOTICE_TTL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd},'%')
AND NOTICE_CN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd},'%')
AND ( NOTICE_TTL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd},'%') OR NOTICE_CN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd},'%') )
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
